content: ABOUT THE CAMPAIGNMoneypot.com builds upon the code that powers bustabit and bustadice. The goal of this signature campaign is to build brand trust and loyalty. The campaign initially expect to the next 6 months. As a member of this campaign, you are encouraged to make discussions, leave suggestions, and share your experience ..about Moneypot on their ANN thread...As the campaign manager, I hold marketing budget. When you are joining the campaign, please read the latest post to know escrow balance. If there are not enough balance for coming weeks then join at your own risk however it's always expected the when funds are not sufficient the management will top up the escrow balance.CAMPAIGN REWARDS Legendary: $3.00 per post up to 25 posts each week.Hero: $2.60 per post up to 25 posts each week.Sr. Member: $2.20 per post up to 25 posts each week.Full Member: $1.60 per post up to 25 posts each week.EXTRA BONUSâ–¶ï¸..Each week, I will pick one poster to win $15...â–¶ï¸ To be eligible for this bonus, you must reach the minimum campaign requirements.â–¶ï¸ The more you post, the higher your chances are of winning the bonus.PREVENT AI DOMINATIONThis campaign is protected by Prevent AI Domination terms defined here:ğŸ’¹ğŸ“ˆ Bitcointalk Campaign Management ğŸ’ªğŸ”¥ Signature & Bounty. â–¶ï¸ If I find campaign members breaching these terms, I will remove them from the campaign immediately. â–¶ï¸ If you find AI-written posts for this campaign and report them to me publicly or via PM, you will receive the weekly payment instead of the accused campaigner (if your report was successful). Please include as much evidence as possible when submitting a report.CAMPAIGN RULESâ–¶ï¸ Wear the appropriate signature, avatar, personal text during the campaignâ–¶ï¸ Wear personal text: Moneypot.com - Crash with the Lowest House Edge!â–¶ï¸ Minimum of five posts in the "Gambling" and "Gambling Discussion" sectionsâ–¶ï¸ Posts must be minimum of 150 characters long and constructiveâ–¶ï¸ Posts in the following boards/sections are not eligible: "Off-Topic", "Archival, Games & Rounds", "Investor-Based Games", "Wall Observers", "Serious Discussion", "Altcoin Discussion", "Lending", "Press", "Politics & Society", other signature campaign threads, including this one, any ANN threads (ANN posted on the "Gambling" board are allowed), and areas where the signature is not visibleâ–¶ï¸ No valid negative from DT network unless prior approved by meâ–¶ï¸ Multi-account (alts) can apply but will need to give up all except only one if accepted more than one.â–¶ï¸ You must have minimum five merits in the last 120 daysâ–¶ï¸ Join my Telegram group: https://t.me/R7BountyQAIMPORTANT INFORMATIONâ–¶ï¸ You are not allowed to change anything on the signature code. If you edit the signature code, I will disqualify you immediatelyâ–¶ï¸ I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign, or edit any rules of this campaignâ–¶ï¸ The week starts on Thursday and ends on Wednesday (UTC)â–¶ï¸ Please check the spreadsheet comment column and your payment information regularly.HOW TO APPLYReply to this thread with the following informationCode:Rank:Bech32 address:Merit earned in the last 120 days:..SPREADSHEET..AVATARLink :
